title: All That He Wants
description: Lily Ross was having another miserable day at work when tall, dark, and stunningly handsome walked in.After hours.With some very unusual requests.When she's least expecting it, mysterious Connor Brooks turns Lily's world upside down and plunges her into a torrid, passionate love affair that might just ruin her life......or save it.19,000 words. Contains explicit sensual scenes.
author: Olivia Thorne
